name: Fire Hose (fongzie)
description:
A game for the Playdate, made in Pulp.

Move the fire hose around the screen and clear floor upon floor of deadly spreading fires.

A: Fire hose!
B: Music on/off
Crank: wind in your hose to drag the water tank / sprinkler.

Apologies if this game concept already exists - I made this game 2 weeks after receiving my Playdate so I haven't seen all of the games in season 1 yet!
